GSP.content: for Husserl, limits of genetic description of the ego itself (i.e. passivity/activity), are provisional, not definitive

DIF.content: classically, sign is treated as deferred presence, as differance of temporization > sign is thus provisional, secondary > Derrida questioning this logic: to think originary differance, one would have to recognize origin, archi-, telos, eskhaton have always denoted presence: ousia, parousia
differance not provisional, also not a master name

WAP.content: Cartesian doubt is provisional, methodical, not skeptical doubt

D.content: atheism in Kabbalah, belief only in # [?] > Numbers a cabal/cabala where blanks only provisionally filled in

LI.content: “ideal concept” (i.e. rigorous concept) vs. pragmatic concept (empirically useful, provisionally convenient, constructed w/out rigor)

SPEC.content: to describe structural necessity of borrowing as provisional/external fatality is classical logic [Freud often does this]: suspense is provisional, notes/coins must be guaranteed in final judgment
